implementationPatterns.name: API Response Feedback
implementationPatterns.code:
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { InOnPageMessage } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

const message = ref<{ type: string; text: string } | null>(null);

const saveData = async () => {
  try {
    await api.save(data);
    message.value = {
      type: 'success',
      text: 'Data saved successfully'
    };
  } catch (error) {
    message.value = {
      type: 'error',
      text: 'Failed to save data. Please try again.'
    };
  }
  
  // Auto-dismiss after 5 seconds
  setTimeout(() => {
    message.value = null;
  }, 5000);
};
</script>

<template>
  <InOnPageMessage
    v-if="message"
    :type="message.type"
    size="medium"
    :title-text="message.text"
  />
</template>

implementationPatterns.name: Feature Announcements
implementationPatterns.description: Highlight new features or important info
implementationPatterns.code:
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { InOnPageMessage } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

const showAnnouncement = ref(true);

const dismissAnnouncement = () => {
  showAnnouncement.value = false;
  localStorage.setItem('feature-announcement-dismissed', 'true');
};

const mounted = () => {
  const dismissed = localStorage.getItem('feature-announcement-dismissed');
  showAnnouncement.value = !dismissed;
};
</script>

<template>
  <InOnPageMessage
    v-if="showAnnouncement"
    type="info"
    size="large"
    title-text="New feature: Bulk export"
    description-text="You can now export multiple items at once."
    link-status
    link-text="Learn more"
    @link-click="openDocs"
  >
    <template #extraMessage>
      <button @click="dismissAnnouncement">Dismiss</button>
    </template>
  </InOnPageMessage>
</template>
implementationPatterns.when: Announcing new features or important updates

commonMistakes.title: Not providing descriptive title and description
commonMistakes.description: Messages should have clear, actionable text
commonMistakes.correct: <InOnPageMessage type="error" title-text="Error occurred" description-text="Please check your input and try again" />
commonMistakes.impact: Empty or unclear error messages confuse users

commonMistakes.title: Not using appropriate message types
commonMistakes.description: Type should match message severity for accessibility
commonMistakes.impact: Screen readers and visual indicators won't match message severity
